title: Bananas in pyjamas: surf's up
creator_credit: Di Drew, Tammy Burnstock and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: B1 and B2, are the much loved “Bananas in Pyjamas” who get up to a little mischief and lots of fun with their friends “The Teddies” on Cuddles Avenue. The ten fun-filled stories featuring the Bananas, the Teddies and a giant rat called “Rat in a hat” are: “Surf’s up”, “Dancing shoes”, “King rat”, “Snow storm”, “Say cheese”, “Spring clean”, “Rat post”, “Model bananas”, “Rat wash” and “Super bananas”.
creator_credit_for_label: Di Drew, Tammy Burnstock and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
